sources.description: Title: Murder by Invitation Summary: The relatives of a rich old woman unsuccessfully try to have her declared insane, so they can divide up her money. To show them that there are no hard feelings, she invites them to her ... Directed by: Phil Rosen Actors: Wallace Ford, Marian Marsh, Sarah Padden Production Company: A.W. Hackel Productions Release Date: 30 June 1941 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 The relatives of a rich old woman unsuccessfully try to have her declared insane, so they can divide up her money. To show them that there are no hard feelings, she invites them to her estate for the weekend so she can decide to whom she actually will leave her money when she dies. Soon, however, family members begin disappearing.

sources.title: Murder By Invitation
sources.description: Murders in an old dark house.

sources.title: Murder by Invitation (1941) CRIME THRILLER
sources.description:
Stars: Wallace Ford, Marian Marsh and Sarah Padden
Director: Phil Rosen

The relatives of a rich old woman unsuccessfully try to have her declared insane, so they can divide up her money. To show them that there are no hard feelings, she invites them to her estate for the weekend so she can decide to whom she actually will leave her money when she dies. Soon, however, family members begin disappearing.

metadata.Plot: The relatives of a rich old woman unsuccessfully try to have her declared insane so they can divide up her money. To show them that she harbors no ill feelings, she invites them to her estate for the weekend so she can decide to whom she actually will leave her money when she dies. Soon, however, family members begin disappearing.
metadata.Actors: Wallace Ford, Marian Marsh, Sarah Padden
